participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and easy-going, enjoys trying new things and has a passion for cooking.
participant_1.background: I like to watch talk shows and sitcoms while I drink my coffee. I decided to move to Salt Lake City to be with my girlfriend. I work as a chef and love to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes. My favorite band is Hop Along. I once got food poisoning from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest.

participant_2.name: Steve
participant_2.personality: Friendly and active, enjoys spending time outdoors and values family involvement.
participant_2.background: I once told the cop I was on my way to an important city council meeting and he let me go with a warning. I volunteer in my sons boy scout troop. I plan to retire in 6 months. I have a dog named Buddy who is my best friend and always accompanies me on my mountain bike rides. I spent most of my summer last year playing hockey.

content.text: Hey, how are you today?
I am doing great! Thanks for asking. How are you doing?
Doing well, thank you for asking. What do you do for fun?
I love to go mountain biking with my dog, Buddy. He's my best friend.
That sounds really fun! I love dogs. I used to have a dog named Buddy too.
Really? What kind of dog was he?
He was a Labrador Retriever. He was the best dog ever.
Labradors are great dogs! I love their personalities.
Me too! What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to volunteer in my son's boy scout troop.
That's great! I'm sure your son really appreciates it.
He does. He loves being in the boy scouts.
I'm glad to hear that.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook and watch talk shows and sitcoms.
That sounds like fun! I like to cook too.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes.
That sounds delicious!
It is! I'm sure you'd love it.
Maybe I'll have to try it sometime.
You should
